asap.speechengine

Class TimedAbstractSpeechUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.realizer.planunit.TimedAbstractPlanUnit
      • asap.speechengine.TimedAbstractSpeechUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    asap.realizer.planunit.TimedPlanUnit
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TimedTTSUnit

    public abstract class TimedAbstractSpeechUnit
extends asap.realizer.planunit.TimedAbstractPlanUnit
    Skeleton implementation for TimedSpeechUnits. Keeps track of speech text. Provides convenience methods for start and end feedback sending.
    Author:
    welberge
